name: DxR -A Better Tomorrow
description:
*Story
After a nuclear war, numerous water sources and farmlands were contaminated by radiation. As foundations and politicians seized control of the remaining resources, using laws and tax systems to strip rights from the populace, 'Company,' wielding vast wealth and power, effectively ruled over humanity. In the midst of this, a young scientist leading a resistance group called 'Liberation Front,' driven by a vision of freedom, remained undaunted by reality and sought to liberate humanity from the grip of 'Company'.

*Game Content
Monster × Resistance Organization SLG
Players take on the role of the leader of the resistance organization, commanding the organization to capture, nurture, and modify monsters, while battling against government forces and Company.

This game is a turn-based strategy simulation game. Players need to earn funds through a series of resistance organization activities, capture and develop new monsters, and upgrade monsters and other combat units to defeat stronger enemies. As you complete certain objectives, the main storyline will advance, and the male protagonist will develop a new romantic relationship with the female protagonist.

The combat part of the game is divided into soldier battles and monster battles. In soldier battles, players use their combat units to form a four-person squad to defeat specific enemies and carry out their commands. In monster battles, the monsters controlled by the players will confront the government army's giant robots and giant-sized girls. The game will have different endings based on the player's choices.
